column4: hey guys ... can someone tell me if there is something strange with the following line: "Mem:    515504k total,   511700k used,     3804k free,     8808k buffers" its a bit few free memory out there, huh?

because if memory is being used or in buffer doesn't mean it's not available to other applications.  The OS is constantly swapping out pages of ram to other applications etc.  so free ram is not being used by anything... just wasted
